title: Literally can't play League properly
body:
All my rune pages are messed up even in the old client now for some reason.

If I select one rune page in lobby, a different one is being used in-game.

Player support hasn't replied to me since yesterday and they haven't done anything to fix this for me.

Very frustrating. I was about to buy $100+ RP to get loot for the Darius hextech only skin, but I can't even fucking play properly without runes.

replies.body: We've started seeing a good number of these weird rune page issues, so in order to get a handle on just how many players are being affected we're asking that you hit us up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) if you're having problems with your rune pages.
